website_summaries.verdict: Per ounce, one of the best deals available. Milk-based formula for fussy and/or gassy babies.
pros: Works well for babies with stomach issues
Offers the right nutrients at a budget-friendly price
cons: May cause constipation in some babies

customer_reviews.title: Large sticky chunks in formula
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to find such a great buy online. The cans are huge and are sure to keep me from a weekly trip to Walmart. Unfortunately, when using the first can I noticed about half way through many large sticky chunks that don’t break up nor would I want to feed my infant.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hudlow

customer_reviews.title: Great pricing! Don't be confused
customer_reviews.text: Great pricing! Don't be confused... there are 2 different sized canisters that Similac sells. This one is 2.18lbs, and there is also a 1.86lbs canister that you will find in stores like Target. The ones in Target are about the same price as these ones on amazon... but you get LESS. Be sure to check the size! (2.18lbs. vs. 1.86lbs.)
customer_reviews.author: SwiggitySwooty

customer_reviews.title: Such a relief!
customer_reviews.text: My baby daughter has a GI symptoms since she was born.. we were using a couple different brands of formulas with nooooo improvement.. she was always frustrated and pushing with a lot of gases all day.. until we switched to this type.. it was like magic.. after 3 months of struggling, within a week, all the symptoms were gone and she's happy finally smiling without any discomfort.. We love you similac sensitive.. such a relief! Ps. Always buy formula from Amazon.. they have a great deals. You can find always 40% off coupon.. just keep checking every while and then..
customer_reviews.author: K G

customer_reviews.title: Every baby is different, I know.
customer_reviews.text: For months, we have been giving our baby Similac Pro-Total Comfort (the purple one.) That one never gave her conspitation, painful gas to the point she cries. The purple formula also never gave her HARD POOPS. Babies are not supposed to have HARD poop. Well, this Sensitive formula did not work for my little one’s tummy. It did all the above & needless to say, I’ve already run to the store to get her the purple similac formula. I suggest buying smaller cans of formula before getting large amounts. That’s where I messed up, I thought it’d be ok to try something new & I was so wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Moni

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on the larger tubs!
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best formula for both of my kids. I found that you can avoid foam by swirling the bottle vigorously rather than shaking it. The tubs are about about 2.2 pounds each- I believe you can't find this specific size in stores, plus with a monthly subscription amount and Prime, I'm saving about $20-$25 for an equal amount and for it to be delivered same or next day, depending on when I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Leithead Family

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive tummies
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal for the size. My only complaint is that the formula is very foamy.
customer_reviews.author: Glo

customer_reviews.title: Love this !!
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine suggest me this for my new born and it really helps. This formula really helps for infant not tone gassy !! The only thing concern me now since my boy is 5 month old is immune boost! This formula don’t have that. So thinking for switching to pro sensitive so that he is not too gassy and gets what he needs too. But I totally give 5 starts to start up new borns.
customer_reviews.author: Predhita Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 3 was good
customer_reviews.text: I am the type of mom that has to try the food before I give it to my baby. The first can I tried tasted like pure metal. When I opened it, the smell should of warned me that this is a bad batch Smell like a strong chemical. (Similac powder does not have a smell). But then I tasted it....I spit it out sooo fast. Horrible. It's like drinking pure steel. I was sooo worried about the other two, but I tried them. And they were perfect. So the 2 perfect one is why I'm giving 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Brave

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Made babies extremely fussy. I have twins that both had much worse gas, gas pains, trouble pooping, and trouble feeding after I started using this. I thought they had acid reflux (per the Dr) but once I switched to Enfamil GentleEase they havent had any issues at all. This stuff is cheaper but absolutely not worth your baby being miserable.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I like this kind
customer_reviews.text: If you use subscribe and save, you’ll save yourself a ton of money. The tubs are bigger than what Walmart carries. Plus you’re potentially saving up to 15% on top of that. You’re getting more bang for your buck. Our baby spit up constantly until we introduced him to the ‘orange can,’ so it’s worth a shot.
customer_reviews.author: V Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: convenience
customer_reviews.text: I was happy that I can order this formula online for my niece because my cousin did not want to go out to buy it. If she had to go out, she needed to go out with her baby and it was not a good idea when living in NYC. These are 3 packs and will last for about 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Ladd

customer_reviews.title: Much better price than stores.
customer_reviews.text: We have always bought through Amazon for my sons formula. With his protein issues it has been the cheapest route. I always suggest to other mom's to buy in bulk (within reason).
customer_reviews.author: Sam Crespo

customer_reviews.title: Rotten
customer_reviews.text: Rotten formula. Unfortunately we didn’t realize the foul smell in one of the boxes and ended up with our baby vomiting violently. Seems like this is an isolated issue for Similac sensitive formulas sold by Amazon, we bought the same formula from Walgreens and had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: ICY

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal you can't find it anywhere else
customer_reviews.text: Its awesom deal and you can't find this size anywhere else, with this deal i saved almost 30$, almost 125 gram more between the biggest size in walmart or walgreen at the same price, great deal
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies with milk issues!
customer_reviews.text: My first born was on similac senstive and eliminated the fussiness after eating. Now that my second is here, was hoping she wouldn't have the same issue with milk but she does. Of course, similac sensitive worked wonders on her, no more crying after eating :)
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Rotten. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our 3 month old who is a great eater. All of a sudden he wasn’t finishing bottles, was spitting up and gagging while eating. Finally we decided to compare it to a store bought canister of the exact same formula, and when we tasted this one we both gagged. It is metallic and rotten tasting. I’m not sure what’s going on, but i reported the issue to Amazon and will also be calling Similac.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Cant beat this price! After tons of orders over the last couple of years we finally received a bundle with 1 can that had a dent and leaked powder. All I asked for was 1 replacement can...we received a whole new bundle of 3. Great seller and customer service !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal,!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a much better deal than if you were to buy it by the can at a big box stores. Arrived on time and as described.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Schicke

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE SAME SIMILAC!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought with this Coronavirus buying this milk online would be helpful, but my daughter is spitting up the milk after each feeding. She’s been using the Similac sensitive since she was born and never had an issue. The minute she started using the can from Amazon it’s a continuous problem. There is also a bad smell I noticed after examining the container. Please be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: The bad reviews are right. This is not the same Similac sensitive that you buy in the store. The milk tastes rancid. I’m furious.
customer_reviews.author: Anney Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only formula we've used for all three of our girls! It helped their gas and reflux immensly!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Zmia

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted but too expensive. Taking advantage of customer
customer_reviews.text: Price is expensive. I noticed after I brought it, it was lowered to a normal rate. Very frustrating in these covid times to shop from sites that don’t try to steal extra money from you.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M

customer_reviews.title: Good buy to save on formula each month!
customer_reviews.text: Ordering this case of formula is much cheaper than in stores! They don’t sell these size containers where i am and it makes it much more convenient and save money! My son has a huge appetite and goes through formula quickly, and have a re order for every 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Chyna-Dahl Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Tastes gross but my 4 month old seems to like it.
customer_reviews.text: Ships quickly and beats the store brand in price. My 4 month old is sensitive to regular formula so the sensitive kind works well for supplementing and doesn’t give her gas like the purple kind by enfamil.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Wisdom

customer_reviews.title: Good but expensive
customer_reviews.text: It's good but pricey. There are other brands/alternatives of cost is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: dstick

customer_reviews.title: Damaged products
customer_reviews.text: My daughter would only drink this formula since I can no longer breastfeed. Price is amazing on here if there's a promotion. However, more than half of the time, product will come damaged. They pretty much would tell you to suck it up, there's nothing they can do. You would have to call in multiple times to get someone who truly understands and will give you the option to refund or replace.
customer_reviews.author: TNg

customer_reviews.title: Best formula for my baby
customer_reviews.text: My baby has severe acid reflux and tummy troubles this formula has worked the best for him. We’ve tried every other formula under the son and stuck with similac sensitive. Also love the fast shipping and coupons amazon offers.
customer_reviews.author: @mazon Cu$tomer

customer_reviews.title: Need more options
customer_reviews.text: There needs to be more options for subscriptions ... 4 or 5 cans/month or delivery options better. I have a subscription for 3 cans each month, but we need a little over 1 can/week. I do not have storage space to store 9 cans to get me through 2 months. It would be nice if you could just pick the amount you need and the number of weeks for delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Lowers gas and relieves the pain from it
customer_reviews.text: Our little one was having issues with gas, this formula helped subside the gas and pain that came with other formulas. Less focus on pain brought more smiles and coos until the laughter and goofy play began.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan Pustizzi

customer_reviews.title: Dented cans
customer_reviews.text: The box in which it came had been tossed around cause 2 cans out of 3 are dented. This is my baby’s milk. It’s expensive and I expect better handling of the packages
customer_reviews.author: Darkmetal666

customer_reviews.title: Random price increase
customer_reviews.text: Last 3 purchases $91. Now $114 for same thing. Not buying at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle J.

customer_reviews.title: Almost a WHOLE yr. before it expires.
customer_reviews.text: Is exactly what I wanted has almost a full year till expired. Two thumbs up on same day delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the product and found this to be a good price and fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Diana Carter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: If you couldn’t grab Similac Pro Sensitive then this is the best budget friendly alternative. Easy to digest.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Renee Dela Rosa

customer_reviews.title: What a bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a good deal for formula. Better than you can find in store. My daughter went from breast milk to Similac sensitive with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Melodie Franco

customer_reviews.title: Save money
customer_reviews.text: Love stocking up on the must haves with amazon subscribe and save. Cuts the formula bill down a ton.
customer_reviews.author: Debe & Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super easy packing that I just open and put in the baby brezza machine
customer_reviews.author: Penny M. Trejo

customer_reviews.title: Foamy
customer_reviews.text: It is foamy but does not upset babies stomach which is what’s important
customer_reviews.author: jules

customer_reviews.title: No return on damage?
customer_reviews.text: I normally always order this, unfortunately this time is showed up damaged! Clearly damaged and I’m unable to return!
customer_reviews.author: Brett Harrison

customer_reviews.title: ... sensitive tummy that nothing seemed to work until someone recommended Similac Sensitive formula
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble breastfeeding my second son and he had such a sensitive tummy that nothing seemed to work until someone recommended Similac Sensitive formula...saved my sanity and my son!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Good price with coupon
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described used before came in good packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Haley L Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best price you can find on this fórmula! Even better if you subscribe!
customer_reviews.author: Sandrew Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad and tastes bad. Not like regular Similac sensitive.
customer_reviews.text: These Similac does not taste good. It tastes like fish and smells so bad that it give my baby a stomach ache. It’s a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ying Her

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! I same formula you buy anywhere just way lower price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: The 3 pack is just enough for a month. The sensitive is much easier on my son's stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: A Great deal and the formula is the only one that doesn’t make our baby gassy or spit up! You can also look for extra savings offered on this product too!
customer_reviews.author: Ray Liz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for a year and it has always woked great. Less expensive than the grocery store by far
customer_reviews.author: penname

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for buying in bulk. My favorite brand of formula!
customer_reviews.author: L Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Cans
customer_reviews.text: 2/3 cans had very large dents in them. Definitely makes me not want to purchase this on amazon in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Great for gassy and colicky babies.
customer_reviews.text: I have got to say that this formula has been a lifesaver for my now 8 month old daughter. I started giving it to her since she was a month old because I couldn’t find another formula to help and soothe my daughters fussiness and gas.
customer_reviews.author: Shara M Vanegas

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: The container is bigger than the ones bought in the store
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: I do recommend it as a formula to start with and see ...
customer_reviews.text: My oldest son did well with this formula, I do recommend it as a formula to start with and see how your baby does with formula.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the price!!!! Love the same day shipping!
customer_reviews.author: miguel hidalgo jr.

customer_reviews.title: Bigger can than what you buy at Walmart or other stores
customer_reviews.text: The cans are much bigger (989g) than what you buy at Walmart or other stores (845g), therefore they are cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Ammar

customer_reviews.title: No scooper
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using similic for both our kids and we love it. This was a great deal my only complaint is ours arrived without the scoopers inside which makes me a bit uneasy thankfully I saved my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Lasted about two and a half months for our 4-6 month old.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Ann Hartley

customer_reviews.title: how to end?
customer_reviews.text: I want to end subscription. no longer need it. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive tummies
customer_reviews.text: My son was able to tolerate this formula better than the advanced
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for this baby
customer_reviews.text: This formula is doing great. The baby had heart surgery shortly after birth and the problem he had before as well as after can cause reflux. My daughter suggested the lactose free while they were still in the hospital because she has a lactose problem. Since they changed him to this kind, no spitting up and the reflux problem is way better.
customer_reviews.author: MWalters

customer_reviews.title: Would like to see Similac on Amazon run more specials like ...
customer_reviews.text: Only formula my DD will take. Would like to see Similac on Amazon run more specials like this!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Crozier

customer_reviews.title: If your going to stock up, this would be your best choice
customer_reviews.text: perfect to order when your too lazy to hit up a target, Bjs or Costco.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sandigan

customer_reviews.title: ... been using this since birth and we've been pleasantly pleased. He very rarely throws-up
customer_reviews.text: My son has been using this since birth and we've been pleasantly pleased. He very rarely throws-up, maybe a total of 5-6 times in 6 months. Plus he's growing like a weed. Very good product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: The formula came in the really big cans as posted on the picture. Three large cans are 2.81 pounds each. Received quickly. Packaging was perfect. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Lane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Same as like breastmilk very well prepared and satisfied happy mom
customer_reviews.author: srikanth dongari

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helped my Eliza with spitting up . Seemed to calm her stomach
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great deal! Especially if you subscribe and save
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! Especially if you subscribe and save. These are the super large canisters. Similac is the best. I always go sensitive with my kids. The regular seemed a bit much when switching from bm to formula but sensitive was just right. It's formula so I would say def buy in bulk for the savings. You're gonna use it. Every dollar counts!
customer_reviews.author: Acecondley

customer_reviews.title: so it was been great for us
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's cheaper at Costco. But if you can find the right coupons or Amazon Deals, it evens out with the 3 pack monthly. This was the only formula my baby could tolerate, so it was been great for us. It was also helpful knowing that our supply would come on X date, so we could plan accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... and tried this since amazon was running such an amazing deal. Within hours she was super fussy and ...
customer_reviews.text: We typically use Pro-Sensitive and tried this since amazon was running such an amazing deal. Within hours she was super fussy and gassy. Tried it for about a week and got the same results. Similac states that there are little differences, but my baby definitely notices.
customer_reviews.author: Kaytlin

customer_reviews.title: the product seems great for the value
customer_reviews.text: My baby definitely drinks more than what is advertised as a 1 month supply. However, the product seems great for the value. Perhaps my baby is a healthy eater:)
customer_reviews.author: Miko

customer_reviews.title: Bulk formula is nice
customer_reviews.text: Maybe my baby just eats a lot but it's not a 1 month supply. I go through just about a can a week.
customer_reviews.author: Ryn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Could not use because doctor changed his formula to Similac for acid reflex
customer_reviews.author: Georgie

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the BEST prices on formula i have found
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the BEST prices on formula i have found. Comparable to Sams club or Costco. It also dissolves better than the same formula in the white plastic container with the orange lid. Which is perfect because my twins do not like warm milk. I usually mix it up in batches and keep it in the refrigerator (it is good for 24 hours once mixed). I use a Dr. Browns formula mixing pitcher. The combination of this formula and the mixing pitcher has been an absolute lifesaver for our family and managing 5 kids. Four of which are 4 and under.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a great buy! I received a coupon for Similac
customer_reviews.text: This has been the only formula that has worked well for my baby. It helps minimize gas pains along with keeping her regulated. She immediately showed improvement once we switched her to the sensitive formula! This was a great buy! I received a coupon for Similac. Love that I can get bigger canisters so I can purchase less frequently!
customer_reviews.author: Kmonni2

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Formula is expensive to begin with...So might as well save $$, have a months worth shipped at once, and not worry about running out!
customer_reviews.author: Sabah Ozan

customer_reviews.title: This is better than the regular Similac Advance formula because it does ...
customer_reviews.text: This is better than the regular Similac Advance formula because it does not make child gassy. Easier on the stomach for digestion. Its 3 Formula cans that will last for a month (depends on child feeding habbits). Also its 989gs(24.73gs /$1) vs 845gs (26.42/$1) at walmart.
customer_reviews.author: A A

customer_reviews.title: Tin/Metal Packaging Taints Powder Formula - Horrible Smell
customer_reviews.text: The "frustration free packaging" includes Similac that comes in a metal tin. From the moment you open the product, there is a very strong odor of tin/metal. The powder formula smells like tin/metal. I tried feeding to baby and they rejected the whole first day! Definitely going back to the plastic containers, even if they are more expensive. Disappointed in the metal/tin packaging and the effect on the powder formula.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good product we found better prices at Sams club plus we can use manufacturer coupons
customer_reviews.author: Jason A Shell

customer_reviews.title: ... of October of the year 2017 I am very annoying. I need to change
customer_reviews.text: the milk comes to expire the one of October of the year 2017 I am very annoying. I need to change it I need the milk to come due 2018 the last milk I bought brings date due 10/01/2017 I had to throw it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great formula, good pricing, buy it
customer_reviews.text: So glad that Amazon finally decided to enter the baby formula game. In the past Target has always dominated pricing for Similac, but now Amazon has offered some nice coupons to get their pricing at or below Target pricing. Finally. Great formula for babies with sensitive stomachs. We tried many different formulas with our first child, and ended up using this. With our second born, we started he straight away on this and its been smooth sailing.
customer_reviews.author: Just Another Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Best Price! BIG Cans!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best price I could find on Similac Infant Formula. The ones they sell at walley-world are $32 each and although they tout 30% more in the can FREE they are only 1.86 lbs each. These cans are BIG 2.18 lbs per can! That averages to $31 bucks per can and almost an extra pound of product. Best of all I got 40% off on my 1st order! WHAT?!!! All 3 cans for $55.50!! Woot Woot!!
customer_reviews.author: Katrinacop

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: The price was great on these but they were not filled to the top of the Can like when I buy at the drugstore..... UPDATE MY SON HAS VOMITED AFFER 3 BOTTLES OF THE FIRST CAN EVERY SINGLE TIME. DO NOT BUY AT A GOOD PRICE. SOMETHING IS DEF WRONG WITH IT!! MY KID IS NOT A PUKER. HE IS 10 MONTHS OLD.
customer_reviews.author: KATHLEEN M.

customer_reviews.title: Happy baby=happy mommy
customer_reviews.text: If you have a lactose sensitive baby get this. We tried 5 different formulas and this and the pro-sensitive are the only ones that we continued using. With any other formula my son would get a really really bad diaper rash in addition to being super cranky.
customer_reviews.author: Leanna

customer_reviews.title: We have had a better experience with Similac sensitive and Similac sensitive pro compared ...
customer_reviews.text: My little one has milk intolerant issues. We have had a better experience with Similac sensitive and Similac sensitive pro compared to Nutramigen. Similac Sensitive is heavier on my baby's stomach allowing her to sleep longer; not to mention the cost savings. My first baby only took breast milk so when my 2nd had a milk intolerant, we found this brand to be the best fit for our family.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Rills

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I buy the pack every three weeks to ensure baby never runs out. Fresh, fairly good packaging and good price. My 5 month old has never gotten sick, no colic or indigestion issues, over all I am very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Sammiesez

customer_reviews.title: Great formula
customer_reviews.text: My baby lives on this formula! I love that he doesn't get too gassy on it. My baby was a preemie and has been taking similac products since day one in the hospital.
customer_reviews.author: Dominoe lamattina

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Similac Sensitive is the only formula that has really worked for our little guy, so I was very happy to find such a great deal! We will definitely continue ordering in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: So pricey
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product just wish it didn't cost an arm and a leg and an eye socket
customer_reviews.author: ALI R EMAMI

customer_reviews.title: subscription
customer_reviews.text: I have these for subscription delivery !and it helps a lot with multiplies! The price is the same I would pay for at the grocery store. We go through three every week and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Shanean Borchardt

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: This was basically buy two get one free, which is a great deal for formula. We go through quite a bit of formula so I’m always looking for the best price
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Helped with fussy one who appeared to be in pain on other formula's. Everyone's different though
customer_reviews.author: blucube

customer_reviews.title: Good milk - keeps my infant happy ;)
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves the milk, well priced when it’s on sale!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My twins are doing really great on this formula after trying many other kinds and brands
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: Great value. I do subscribe & save, but this case of 3 cans doesn't last the whole month, so I have to grab an additional can from the grocery store. Not a problem since this is such a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it when your baby starts sleeping through the ...
customer_reviews.text: Well worth it when your baby starts sleeping through the night after months of trying to find a truly sensitive stomach brand.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and worth the price-especially if it’s on sale. I feel safe feeding it to my granddaughter
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Diemert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome for my kiddo and you can't find a bigger size anywhere. Great price too!

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, way better than the grocery store. Fast shipping as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Furchert

customer_reviews.title: Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Our baby has been doing very well on this formula. I believe it helped her with gas and constipation. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lilit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my baby and he turns it into poop. Works exactly as described

customer_reviews.title: Shipped well. Good product

customer_reviews.author: Samantha Collins

product_meta.title: Similac Sensitive Infant Formula with Iron, Powder, One Month Supply, 34.9 Ounces (Pack of 3)
product_meta.description: Similac Sensitive Infant Formula is an easy to digest, milk based formula designed for sensitive tummies. Our baby formula is a nutritionally complete formula designed for fussiness and gas due to lactose sensitivity and features OptiGRO, our exclusive blend of DHA, Lutein and Vitamin E to help support your baby's overall growth, brain, eye and immune system development. Please note this is not for infants with galactosemia.
feature_bullets: Similac is the first leading infant formula brand with no artificial growth hormone (no significant difference has been shown between milk derived from rbST treated and non rbST treated cows)
Similac Sensitive Infant Formula is a milk based formula for your baby's first year that is specially designed for fussiness and gas due to lactose sensitivity
NUTRIENTS: Features OptiGRO, our exclusive blend of DHA, Lutein and Vitamin E, special nutrients found in breast milk that are important for helping support baby's brain and eye development
TRUSTED FORMULA: Similac is the #1 brand chosen by moms (Total US infant formula, all outlets as of 3/31/2018, Nielsen data)

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
